title: Universal Stylus Initiative used by Chromebooks hits version 2.0 with NFC wireless charging support
content:
Back in 2018, Google joined the Universal Stylus Initiative to boost the adoption of an active pen protocol. USI today announced version 2.0 of its standard with a handful of new features possible.

more…

The post Universal Stylus Initiative used by Chromebooks hits version 2.0 with NFC wireless charging support appeared first on 9to5Google.
